sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_LIB WHERE STATE = 'N'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO LIBBATCHUPDATE_LIB(ID, LIBNAME, TYPENAME, PDTYPE, LIBSIZE) VALUES(#id#, #libname# , #typename#, #pdtype#, #libsize#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_LIB WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE LIBBATCHUPDATE_LIB SET STATE='Y', ZIPID= #value# WHERE STATE='N'
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_LIB WHERE ZIPID =#zipid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP (ZIPNAME, DESCRIPTION, ZIPID, ZIPSIZE, CHECKSUMSIZE, DESCRIPTION_ALIAS, DEPLOYTYPE) VALUES(#ZIPNAME#, #DESCRIPTION#, #ZIPID#, #ZIPSIZE#, #CHECKSUMSIZE#,#DESCRIPTION_ALIAS#, #DEPLOYTYPE#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT PD_NAME FROM esb_PRODUCT WHERE PD_TYPE = 'IM'
PD_GROUP_ID = #GROUP_ID#

SELECT PD_ID FROM esb_PRODUCT WHERE PD_TYPE = 'IM'
PD_NAME = #PD_NAME#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS (IM_NAME, IM_IP, DEPLOYID, DEPLOYTYPE) VALUES(#IM_NAME#, #IM_IP#,#DEPLOYID#, #DEPLOYTYPE#)
sqlMap.select: select * from (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS row_num, S.*,D.ZIPID FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS S, LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY D WHERE S.DEPLOYID = D.DEPLOYID AND S.STATE ='N' AND S.IM_NAME=#IMNAME# AND S.DEPLOYTYPE = 'B' )t WHERE row_num = 1

select * from (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS row_num, S.*,D.ZIPID FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS S, LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY D WHERE S.DEPLOYID = D.DEPLOYID
S.STATE =#STATE#
AND S.IM_NAME=#IMNAME# AND S.DEPLOYID=#DEPLOYID# AND S.DEPLOYTYPE ='R')t where row_num =1
sqlMap.update:
update LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS set DEPLOYTYPE = 'R'
STATE =#STATE#
AND IM_NAME=#IMNAME# AND DEPLOYID=#DEPLOYID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP WHERE ZIPID =#ZIPID#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS SET STATE =#STATE_CD#
ERR_LOG = #ERR_LOG#
DEPLOYTYPE = #DEPLOYTYPE#
START_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
END_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE IM_NAME=#IMNAME# AND DEPLOYID=#DEPLOYID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT Z.*,D.DEPLOYID FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY D, LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP Z WHERE Z.ZIPID = D.ZIPID

SELECT T2.* FROM(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS ROW_NUM, T1.* FROM(SELECT * FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP
SUBSTR(CHAR(REG_DT),1,10) BETWEEN '$STA_DATE$' AND '$END_DATE$'
ZIP_STATE = #ZIP_STATE#
)T1
T1.ZIPID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT L.ZIPID FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP Z, LIBBATCHUPDATE_LIB L, LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY D ,LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS S WHERE Z.ZIPID = L.ZIPID AND Z.ZIPID = D.ZIPID AND D.DEPLOYID = S.DEPLOYID AND (L.LIBNAME LIKE '%$LIBNAME$%' OR Z.DESCRIPTION_ALIAS LIKE '%$LIBNAME$%' OR Z.ZIPNAME LIKE '%$LIBNAME$%' OR S.IM_NAME LIKE '%$LIBNAME$%') )
)T2
OFFSET $PAGE_INDEX$ ROWS FETCH first $MAX_ROW$ ROW ONLY

SELECT COUNT(ZIPID) FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP
ZIPID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT L.ZIPID FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP Z, LIBBATCHUPDATE_LIB L, LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY D ,LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS S WHERE Z.ZIPID = L.ZIPID AND Z.ZIPID = D.ZIPID AND D.DEPLOYID = S.DEPLOYID AND (L.LIBNAME LIKE '%$LIBNAME$%' OR Z.DESCRIPTION_ALIAS LIKE '%$LIBNAME$%' OR Z.ZIPNAME LIKE '%$LIBNAME$%' OR S.IM_NAME LIKE '%$LIBNAME$%') )
SUBSTR(CHAR(REG_DT),1,10) BETWEEN '$STA_DATE$' AND '$END_DATE$'
ZIP_STATE = #ZIP_STATE#

select t2.* from( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS ROW_NUM, t1.* from( select PD.PD_ID, PD.PD_TYPE, PD.PD_ORDER, PD.PD_NAME, PD.PD_ALIAS, PD.PD_REG_DATE, PD.PD_REG_USER, PD.IN_IM_ID, PD.FINAL_NW_STATUS, PD.FINAL_MO_STATUS, PD.FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, PD.MO_ERROR_CNT, IM.IM_ID, IM.IM_IP, IM.IM_PORT, IM.IM_OS, IM.IM_INFO, IM.IM_VER, PD.FINAL_DS_STATUS, PD.PD_GROUP_ID, PD.PD_FAVORITE, PD.PD_FIREWALL, PD.PD_STATUS from (select case when {fn TIMESTAMPDIFF(SQL_TSI_SECOND, FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, current_timestamp)} > 180 then '-9' when {fn TIMESTAMPDIFF(SQL_TSI_SECOND, FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, current_timestamp)} is null then 'null' else '1' end PD_STATUS , pd1.* from esb_PRODUCT pd1) PD , esb_IMANAGER IM
, INDIGO_GROUP_MAPPING UMG
where PD.PD_ID = IM.IM_ID
PD.PD_NAME NOT IN (SELECT IM_NAME FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS WHERE DEPLOYID = (SELECT LD.DEPLOYID FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP LZ, LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY LD WHERE LZ.ZIPID = LD.ZIPID
LZ.ZIPID = #ZIPID#
) )
PD.PD_GROUP_ID = UMG.GROUP_ID AND UMG.USER_ID = #USER_ID#
PD.PD_GROUP_ID = #GROUP_ID#
$SEARCH_TYPE$ like '%' ||#SEARCH_STRING#|| '%'
PD.PD_STATUS = #STATUS_VALUE#
AND NOT (IM_VER = '1.1.3' OR IM_VER = '1.1.5' OR IM_VER = '1.2.0' OR IM_VER = '1.3.0' OR IM_VER = '1.3.1' OR IM_VER = '1.3.2') order by PD.PD_ORDER, PD.PD_NAME, PD.PD_REG_DATE )t1 )t2
OFFSET $SKIP_INDEX$ ROWS FETCH first $MAX_ROW$ ROW ONLY

select count(t2.ROW_NUM) from( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS ROW_NUM, t1.* from( select PD.PD_ID from (select case when {fn TIMESTAMPDIFF(SQL_TSI_SECOND, FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, current_timestamp)} > 180 then '-9' when {fn TIMESTAMPDIFF(SQL_TSI_SECOND, FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, current_timestamp)} is null then 'null' else '1' end PD_STATUS , pd1.* from esb_PRODUCT pd1) PD , esb_IMANAGER IM
, INDIGO_GROUP_MAPPING UMG
where PD.PD_ID = IM.IM_ID
PD.PD_GROUP_ID = UMG.GROUP_ID AND UMG.USER_ID = #USER_ID#
PD.PD_GROUP_ID = #GROUP_ID#
$SEARCH_TYPE$ like '%' ||#SEARCH_STRING#|| '%'
PD.PD_STATUS = #STATUS_VALUE#
AND NOT (IM_VER = '1.1.3' OR IM_VER = '1.1.5' OR IM_VER = '1.2.0' OR IM_VER = '1.3.0' OR IM_VER = '1.3.1' OR IM_VER = '1.3.2') order by PD.PD_REG_DATE, PD.PD_ORDER, PD.PD_NAME )t1 )t2

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS WHERE DEPLOYID = (SELECT LD.DEPLOYID FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP LZ, LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY LD WHERE LZ.ZIPID = LD.ZIPID
LZ.ZIPID = #ZIPID# ) AND (STATE = 'N' OR STATE = 'P' OR STATE = 'F')
SELECT L.LIBNAME, L.TYPENAME, L.PDTYPE, L.LIBSIZE, L.ZIPID, Z.DESCRIPTION, Z.ZIPNAME FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_LIB L, LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP Z WHERE L.ZIPID = Z.ZIPID AND Z.ZIPID = #value#
SELECT IM_NAME FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY D, LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP Z, LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS S WHERE D.ZIPID = Z.ZIPID AND D.DEPLOYID =S.DEPLOYID AND D.DEPLOYID =#VALUE#
SELECT DEPLOYID, Z.DEPLOYTYPE FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY D RIGHT OUTER JOIN LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP Z ON Z.ZIPID = D.ZIPID WHERE Z.ZIPID = #VALUE#

SELECT T2.* FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS ROW_NUM, T1.* FROM( SELECT PD.PD_ID, PD.PD_TYPE, PD.PD_ORDER, PD.PD_NAME, PD.PD_ALIAS, PD.PD_REG_DATE, PD.PD_REG_USER, PD.IN_IM_ID, PD.FINAL_NW_STATUS, PD.FINAL_MO_STATUS, PD.FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, PD.MO_ERROR_CNT, IM.IM_ID, IM.IM_IP, IM.IM_PORT, IM.IM_OS, IM.IM_INFO, IM.IM_VER, PD.FINAL_DS_STATUS, PD.PD_GROUP_ID, PD.PD_FAVORITE, PD.PD_FIREWALL, PD.PD_STATUS, S.STATE, S.DEPLOYID, S.ERR_LOG AS ERRLOG, S.DEPLOYTYPE FROM (select case when {fn TIMESTAMPDIFF(SQL_TSI_SECOND, FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, current_timestamp)} > 180 then '-9' when {fn TIMESTAMPDIFF(SQL_TSI_SECOND, FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, current_timestamp)} is null then 'null' else '1' end PD_STATUS , pd1.* from esb_PRODUCT pd1) PD , esb_IMANAGER IM , LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS S WHERE PD.PD_ID = IM.IM_ID AND PD.PD_NAME = S.IM_NAME AND PD.PD_NAME IN(
'$IM_LIST[]$'
) AND S.DEPLOYID =#DEPLOYID#
$SEARCH_TYPE$ like '%' ||#SEARCH_STRING#|| '%'
PD.PD_STATUS = #STATUS_VALUE#
S.STATE = #STATE#
ORDER BY PD.PD_ORDER, PD.PD_NAME, PD.PD_REG_DATE )T1 )T2
sqlMap.update: UPDATE LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS SET STATE ='T' WHERE DEPLOYID =#DEPLOYID# AND IM_NAME=#IM_NAME#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T2.* FROM(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS row_num, T1.* FROM(SELECT DS.* , LZ.ZIPNAME,LZ.DESCRIPTION_ALIAS,LZ.ZIPSIZE FROM (SELECT LS.DEPLOYID, LD.REG_DT AS REGDT, LD.ZIPID , MAX(case when LS.STATE = 'N' then CNT else 0 end) AS STATEN , MAX(case when LS.STATE = 'P' then CNT else 0 end) AS STATEP , MAX(case when LS.STATE = 'T' then CNT else 0 end) AS STATET , MAX(case when LS.STATE = 'S' then CNT else 0 end) AS STATES , MAX(case when LS.STATE = 'F' then CNT else 0 end) AS STATEF FROM (SELECT STATE, DEPLOYID, COUNT(*) CNT FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS
SUBSTR(CHAR(REG_DT),1,10) BETWEEN '$STA_DATE$' AND '$END_DATE$'
GROUP BY STATE, DEPLOYID) LS, LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY LD WHERE LS.DEPLOYID =LD.DEPLOYID GROUP BY LS.DEPLOYID, LD.REG_DT, LD.ZIPID) DS, LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP LZ WHERE LZ.ZIPID = DS.ZIPID
LZ.ZIPNAME LIKE '%$ZIPNAME$%'
LZ.DESCRIPTION_ALIAS LIKE '%$DESCRIPTION_ALIAS$%'
DS.DEPLOYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT LS.DEPLOYID FROM esb_PRODUCT EP, LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS LS WHERE EP.PD_NAME = LS.IM_NAME AND EP.PD_TYPE='IM' AND EP.PD_NAME=#PD_NAME#)
DS.DEPLOYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT LS.DEPLOYID FROM esb_PRODUCT EP, LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS LS WHERE EP.PD_NAME = LS.IM_NAME AND EP.PD_TYPE='IM' AND EP.PD_ALIAS=#PD_ALIAS#)
)T1 )T2
OFFSET $PAGE_INDEX$ ROWS FETCH first $MAX_ROW$ ROW ONLY

SELECT COUNT(DS.DEPLOYID) FROM (SELECT LS.DEPLOYID, LD.REG_DT AS REGDT, LD.ZIPID FROM (SELECT STATE, DEPLOYID, COUNT(*) CNT FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS
SUBSTR(CHAR(REG_DT),1,10) BETWEEN '$STA_DATE$' AND '$END_DATE$'
GROUP BY STATE, DEPLOYID) LS, LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY LD WHERE LS.DEPLOYID =LD.DEPLOYID GROUP BY LS.DEPLOYID, LD.REG_DT, LD.ZIPID) DS, LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP LZ WHERE LZ.ZIPID = DS.ZIPID
LZ.ZIPNAME LIKE '%$ZIPNAME$%'
LZ.DESCRIPTION_ALIAS LIKE '%$DESCRIPTION_ALIAS$%'
DS.DEPLOYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT LS.DEPLOYID FROM esb_PRODUCT EP, LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS LS WHERE EP.PD_NAME = LS.IM_NAME AND EP.PD_TYPE='IM' AND EP.PD_NAME=#PD_NAME#)
DS.DEPLOYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT LS.DEPLOYID FROM esb_PRODUCT EP, LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS LS WHERE EP.PD_NAME = LS.IM_NAME AND EP.PD_TYPE='IM' AND EP.PD_ALIAS=#PD_ALIAS#)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT PD.PD_ID FROM (select case when {fn TIMESTAMPDIFF(SQL_TSI_SECOND, FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, current_timestamp)} > 180 then '-9' when {fn TIMESTAMPDIFF(SQL_TSI_SECOND, FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, current_timestamp)} is null then 'null' else '1' end PD_STATUS , pd1.* from esb_PRODUCT pd1) PD , esb_IMANAGER IM , LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS S
,INDIGO_GROUP_MAPPING UMG
WHERE PD.PD_ID = IM.IM_ID
PD.PD_GROUP_ID = UMG.GROUP_ID AND UMG.USER_ID = #USER_ID#
PD.PD_GROUP_ID = #GROUP_ID#
AND PD.PD_NAME = S.IM_NAME AND PD.PD_NAME IN(
'$IM_LIST[]$' ) AND S.DEPLOYID =#DEPLOYID#
$SEARCH_TYPE$ like '%' ||#SEARCH_STRING#|| '%'
PD.PD_STATUS = #STATUS_VALUE#
S.STATE = #STATE#
AND NOT (IM_VER = '1.1.3' OR IM_VER = '1.1.5' OR IM_VER = '1.2.0' OR IM_VER = '1.3.0' OR IM_VER = '1.3.1' OR IM_VER = '1.3.2') ORDER BY PD.PD_ORDER, PD.PD_NAME, PD.PD_REG_DATE )T1
SELECT IM_NAME as IMNAME, DEPLOYID FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS WHERE DEPLOYID =#value#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP SET ZIP_STATE ='N' WHERE ZIPID= #value#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ERR_LOG FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS WHERE DEPLOYID = #DEPLOYID# AND IM_NAME =#IMNAME# AND STATE='F'

SELECT D.DEPLOYID, S.IM_NAME as IMNAME FROM LIBBATCHUPDATE_ZIP Z, LIBBATCHUPDATE_DEPLOY D, LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS S WHERE Z.ZIPID = D.ZIPID AND D.DEPLOYID = S.DEPLOYID AND Z.ZIPID= #ZIPID# AND S.STATE='T'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS SET STATE='N' WHERE DEPLOYID = #DEPLOYID# AND STATE ='T'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT IM.IM_IP AS IMIP,IM.IM_VER AS IMVER, PD.PD_STATUS AS PDSTATUS, S.STATE, S.DEPLOYID, S.IM_NAME as IMNAME, S.DEPLOYTYPE, S.START_DT as STARTDT, S.END_DT as ENDDT FROM (select case when {fn TIMESTAMPDIFF(SQL_TSI_SECOND, FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, current_timestamp)} > 180 then '-9' when {fn TIMESTAMPDIFF(SQL_TSI_SECOND, FINAL_MO_REG_DATE, current_timestamp)} is null then 'null' else '1' end PD_STATUS , pd1.* from esb_PRODUCT pd1) PD , esb_IMANAGER IM , LIBBATCHUPDATE_STATUS S WHERE PD.PD_ID = IM.IM_ID AND PD.PD_NAME = IM_NAME AND S.IM_NAME IN(
'$IM_LIST[]$' ) AND S.DEPLOYID =#DEPLOYID#
